level.text: Services available under the Waiver shall include the following:
Behavioral Supports, as set forth in section 937 of Title 29 DCMR;
Community Support Team, as set forth in section 1912 of Title 29 DCMR;
Day Habilitation, as set forth in section 945 of Title 29 DCMR;
Dental, as set forth in section 936 of Title 29 DCMR;
Environmental Accessibilities Adaptations, as set forth in section 926 of Title 29 DCMR;
Family Training, as set forth in section 942 of Title 29 DCMR;
Host Home, as set forth in section 1915 of Title 29 DCMR;
In-Home Supports, as set forth in section 1916 of Title 29 DCMR;
Live-in Caregiver, as set forth in section 1917 of Title 29 DCMR;
Nutrition Evaluation and Consultation, as set forth in section 930 of Title 29 DCMR;
Occupational Therapy, as set forth in section 935 of Title 29 DCMR;
One-time Transitional, as set forth in section 1913 of Title 29 DCMR;
Personal Care Services as an extended service under the State Plan for Medical Assistance as set forth in sections 5004 and 1910 of Title 29 DCMR;
Personal Emergency Response System (PERS), as set forth in section 907 of Title 29 DCMR;
Physical Therapy, as set forth in section 934 of Title 29 DCMR;
Prevocational, as set forth in section 920 of Title 29 DCMR;
Professional Services, as set forth in section 1918 of Title 29 DCMR;
Residential Habilitation, as set forth in section 946 of Title 29 DCMR;
Respite, as set forth in section 994 of Title 29 DCMR;
Skilled Nursing, as an extended service under the State Plan for Medical Assistance and as set forth in section 933 of Title 29 DCMR;
Speech, Hearing and Language, as set forth in section 932 of Title 29 DCMR;
Supported Employment, as set forth in section 929 of Title 29 DCMR;
Supported Living, as set forth in section 993 of Title 29 DCMR;
Transportation, as set forth in section 943 of Title 29 DCMR; and
Vehicle Modifications, as set forth in section 1914 of Title 29 DCMR.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 10207 (November 5, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 11281 (December 30, 2005); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 2882 (March 21, 2008).
